properties.name: spring.elasticsearch.jest.multi-threaded
properties.description: Whether to enable connection requests from multiple execution threads.

properties.name: spring.elasticsearch.jest.proxy.host
properties.description: Proxy host the HTTP client should use.

properties.name: spring.elasticsearch.jest.proxy.port
properties.description: Proxy port the HTTP client should use.

properties.name: spring.elasticsearch.jest.uris
properties.description: Comma-separated list of the Elasticsearch instances to use.

properties.name: spring.elasticsearch.webclient.max-in-memory-size
properties.description: Limit on the number of bytes that can be buffered whenever the input stream needs to be aggregated.

deprecation.reason: Reactive Elasticsearch client no longer uses WebClient.
